definitions.definition: One of the female (feminine) sex or gender.
Belonging to the sex which typically produces eggs (ova), or to the gender which is typically associated with it.
definitions.example: female authors, the leading male and female artists, a female bird cooing at a male, intersex female patients, a trans female vlogger

definitions.definition: Characteristic of this sex/gender. (Compare feminine, womanly.)
definitions.example: stereotypically female pastimes, an insect with typically female coloration

definitions.definition: Tending to lead to or regulate the development of sexual characteristics typical of this sex.
definitions.example: the female chromosome;   estrogen, the primary female sex hormone, is produced by both females and males

definitions.definition: (grammar, less common than 'feminine') Feminine; of the feminine grammatical gender.
Having an internal socket, as in a connector or pipe fitting.
